title: "You can now ping everything on the scoreboard, so knock yourself out."

embed.description: Jax IMAGINE IF I HAD A REAL WEAPON Fixed a bug where Jax was causing games to crash under specific circumstances Janna When we updated Janna, we wanted to avoid hitting her too hard alongside the changes to Ardent Censer.

body: So.... pretty sure it's been over a year now, but... when is this going to actually be a thing? Don't get me wrong, I understand that Riot's goal with that patch wasn't actually to let us ping EVERY item on the scoreboard, but... is there any particular reason why I can't ping a champion's KDA, their CS, a team's dragon count, etc? Doesn't seem like it would be difficult to implement.
